1: -module(xep_0352_csi_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -compile([export_all]).
    6: 
    7: all() ->
    8:     [{group, basic}].
    9: 
   10: 
   11: groups() ->
   12:     [{basic,
   13:       [parallel, shuffle],
   14:       all_tests()
   15:      }].
   16: 
   17: all_tests() ->
   18:     [
   19:      server_announces_csi,
   20:      alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived,
   21:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate,
   22:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order,
   23:      bob_gets_msgs_from_inactive_alice,
   24:      alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack
   25:     ].
   26: 
   27: suite() ->
   28:     escalus:suite().
   29: 
   30: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   31:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   32: 
   33: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   34:     escalus_fresh:clean(),
   35:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   36: 
   37: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   38:     escalus_users:update_userspec(Config, alice, stream_management, true).
   39: 
   40: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   41:     Config.
   42: 
   43: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   44:     timer:sleep(random:uniform(2000)),
   45:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   46: 
   47: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   48:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   49: 
   50: server_announces_csi(Config) ->
   51:     NewConfig = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{alice, 1}]),
   52:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, alice),
   53:     Steps = [start_stream,
   54:              stream_features,
   55:              maybe_use_ssl,
   56:              maybe_use_compression,
   57:              authenticate,
   58:              bind,
   59:              session],
   60:     {ok, _Client, _Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
   61:     true = proplists:get_value(client_state_indication, Features).
   62: 
   63: alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived(Config) ->
   64:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   65:         given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, 1),
   66: 
   67:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
   68:     end).
   69: 
   70: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config) ->
   71:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 1).
   72: 
   73: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order(Config) ->
   74:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 3).
   75: 
   76: 
   77: 
   78: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, N) ->
   79:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   80:         %%Given
   81:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
   82: 
   83:         %%When client becomes active again
   84:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
   85: 
   86:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs)
   87:     end).
   88: 
   89: 
   90: bob_gets_msgs_from_inactive_alice(Config) ->
   91:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   92:         given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, 1),
   93: 
   94:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
   95:     end).
   96: 
   97: alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack(Config) ->
   98:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice,1}], fun(Alice) ->
   99:         given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  100: 
  101:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  102: 
  103:         escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  104: 
  105:     end).
  106: 
  107: given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  108:     %%Given
  109:     MsgsToAlice = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
  110: 
  111:     MsgsToBob = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Bob">>, N),
  112:     send_msgs(Alice, Bob, MsgsToBob),
  113:     timer:sleep(1),
  114:     {MsgsToAlice, MsgsToBob}.
  115: 
  116: 
  117: then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs) ->
  118:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)) ||
  119:      Msg <- Msgs].
  120: 
  121: 
  122: given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  123:     %%Given
  124:     given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  125: 
  126:     timer:sleep(1000),
  127: 
  128:     %%When
  129:     Msgs = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Alice">>, N),
  130:     send_msgs(Bob, Alice, Msgs),
  131:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  132:     Msgs.
  133: 
  134: send_msgs(From, To, Msgs) ->
  135:     [escalus:send(From, escalus_stanza:chat_to(To, Msg)) ||
  136:      Msg <- Msgs].
  137: 
  138: 
  139: gen_msgs(Prefix, N) ->
  140:     [<<Prefix/binary, (integer_to_binary(I))/binary>> || I <- lists:seq(1, N)].
  141: 
  142: given_client_is_inactive(Alice) ->
  143:     escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"inactive">>)).
  144: 
  145: 
  146: csi_stanza(Name) ->
  147:     #xmlel{name = Name,
  148:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:csi:0">>}]}.
  149:
